description.en: Thiruvisanallur Sridhara Aiyyaval brought Ganga to his house well on this day! See also http://www.sriayyaval.org/ .

shlokas:
IzE tasya ca nAmani pravimalaM jJAnaM tayOrUrjitam
prEma prEma ca tatparESu viratizcAnyatra sarvatra ca.
IzEkSA karuNA ca yasya niyatA vRttiH zritasyApi yam
taM vandE nararUpamantakaripuM zrIvEGkaTEzaM gurum..
